name: MonsterMind
description:
MonsterMind

A game about a monster escaping, but you must carefully plan, for once you start, you'll be Out Of Control!

Created for the GMTK Summer 2020 Game Jam.

How to play:

download the zip

unzip the file

go to Build_PC1 > GMTK Real.exe to play

Code by: Jordan, John, Nicolas

Art by: Jordan, Nicolas, Alex

Voiced by: Jordan

Music by: Jordan

Morale support by: Warren, Kells
